meanings.definition: A dish of cross-cut veal shanks braised with vegetables, white wine, and broth.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared delicious ossobucos for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: I ordered ossobucos at the Italian restaurant last night.
meanings.sent3: The ossobucos told a funny joke to the spaghetti and meatballs.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering ossobucos filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The tender ossobucos melted in my mouth with each savory bite.
